about_the_game:
Please is a VR top-down rhythm RPG - while exploring the story, enjoy various rhythm minigames that are a homage to the large rhythm game genres!



Gameplay

  • During bullet hell Boss Battles, protect your avatar by dodging attacks and using your physical hands to block them!
  • Play rhythm minigames that pay an homage to the genre, such as drum hitting, notes falling from the sky, blindly following orders from some random person, etc!
  • Solve puzzles that require controlling your avatar, using your hands, or both!
  • Explore the mysteries of this world, learn about various character's stories and how their Traumas affect them!


World

Traverse a mysterious world of in-between with a variety of residents. These residents seem to be stuck in this world due to their lingering attachment to their Trauma - get to know them, play minigames with them, and eventually defend yourself against their minds! Figure out what role you play in this world - and the mysteries behind it.




The different art styles play into the story of the game; pixel art and low poly art are objects considered in the game world in which your avatar can interact with, while realistic art objects are ones that came from another world and able to interacted with your real hands! How did these foreign looking realistic objects come to this world? Why are you the only one able to interact with it?



Please note that the game does not support Windows Mixed Reality Headsets but might be at a later date.
Join our community on Discord - we're also looking for VR playtesters, pixel artists and generalist modelers!



Thank you for checking out our game!

content_descriptors.notes: As a story game, it deals with how characters talk and deal with their trauma and coming in terms with their death in a post-death world; they share their story through dialogue on what their trauma is and may contain story about losing people near them or triggers about fear and anxiety.

name: Please Demo
short_description: Please is a VR top-down rhythm RPG with various rhythm game mechanics and bullet hell boss battles. Explore the mystery of what this world is and why you are here, learn about the resident's traumas and how to listen to them, and survive to the end!
